content: Michael Schmid on Bitcoin Miners and Heat recycling, Heating an RV with an ASIC, Waterheaters w/S9'shttps://youtu.be/tkQ-38YQdW0This is part 1 of our interview with Michael Schmid, a hacker who has been working on methods to recycle waste heat produced by ASIC Bitcoin miners to solve problems and save resources.
